channel.title: Workspace Setup on Recommender System Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Workspace Setup on Recommender System Solution

item.title: Create AWS EC2
item.description: Create new EC2 to deploy all the code Create key pair Go to Key pairs (ap-northeast-1 region) or Key pairs (cn-north-1 region) Set Name: gcr-rs-dev-workshop-ec2-key Suppose you are using Mac, save the key pair to you local disk, eg: ~/Downloads Open an SSH client, run this command, to ensure your key is not publicly viewable cd ~/Downloads chmod 400 gcr-rs-dev-workshop-ec2-key.pem Create new EC2 instance Go to CloudFormation (ap-northeast-1 region) or CloudFormation (cn-north-1)
